name: The Visitant
description:
A human has come to the Afterlife! All of the spirits are going berserk... we are on the edge! Do something about it, defeat the human!

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys/D-Pad: Move

Z Key/A Button: Shoot

If the game isn't responding to your input, then click on the game window to gain focus.

First time using TIC-80! It was interesting, but it took way too much of my time, which is why this game is much more shorter than usual...

I'm not sure if this game follows the theme well. I mean, there is conflict, but can the Afterlife be considered "on the edge?" I'm not quite sure (^^;

Also, the music in this game is quite mediocre, since I had to compose it myself. Sorry about that...

Anyways, just play the game! Hopefully you will enjoy it!
